articles.author: Cameron Houston
articles.title: Crown email shows how much money you need to be a high-roller - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Crown Resorts has instructed some high-rollers to declare their assets and income, in a bid to stop money laundering at its Melbourne and Perth casinos.
articles.content: Crown has warned those required to make declarations that the information would be used for its customer identification processes and might be shared with government agencies or "third parties for th… [+2484 chars]
